discover.title: Activities
discover.description: Some of the ways we enable and deliver digital research.

discover.title: Research Themes
discover.description: Some pathways of innovation we are exploring.

items.title: Digital creativity
items.description: Experimenting with digital tools to enable, enhance, and expand our cultural experiences and interactions.

items.title: Indigenous Digital Humanities
items.description: Fostering understanding, respect, and cooperation among holding institutions, researchers and minority groups to help work on complex issues around data from indigenous community sources.

items.title: Machine learning and AI
items.description: Working to create a virtual cycle around ML and AI that goes beyond single projects solutions across the triangle of critical, analytical and practical RSE-driven research.

items.title: Data visualisation
items.description: Organizing data with form, structure and shape to help users understand the story it has to tell.

communities.title: Communities
communities.description: Organizations and groups we have formal attachment to via active contribution, affiliation or sponsorship as description of the communities space.

items.title: Digital Futures Institute
items.description: King’s College London Institute bringing together expertise from across all disciplines aiming at living well with technology.

items.title: King’s Institute for Artificial Intelligence
items.description: King’s College London Institute supporting and promoting work in artificial intelligence (AI) across the College.

items.title: Society of Research Software Engineering
items.description: UK professional society establishing a research environment that recognises the vital role of software in research.

items.title: UK-Ireland Digital Humanities Association
items.description: UK and Ireland professional association bringing together digital humanities researchers, practitioners and organisations.

items.title: Digital Research Infrastructure for the Arts and Humanities
items.description: Pan-European infrastructure enhancing and supporting digitally-enabled research and teaching across the arts and humanities.

items.title: Text Encoding Initiative
items.description: International consortium developing and maintaining a standard for the representation of texts in digital form.
